text: Arnaut Daniel de Riberac (today Arnaut Danièl) wrote and performed music and poetry in the 12th century. He was Occitan. ==References== * Eusebi, Mario (1995). L'aur'amara. Parma: Pratiche Editrice. . * Pound, Ezra (1910). The Spirit of Romance. New Direction Books (1968 reprinting). Category:Troubadours Category:12th-century births
title: Arnaut Danièl
